commitResults.messageTitle: rename chatbot and add greeting and exit messages
Add scanner to take in user input
commitResults.messageBody:
User can give input to Chatbot and it will respond according to the
input. It can either add task, print the list of tasks or exit when
"bye" is entered as input.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Task class to handle list of tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
The Task class allows us to add tasks to a list. There is a method that
prints the tasks in order.

commitResults.messageTitle: Change if-else statements to switch statements, add new cases
commitResults.messageBody:
Using switch statements look much easier for us to understand and
handle each of the cases depending on user input. Two new cases, mark
and unmark would have an index behind the input which is why an if
statement is used to check for the specific input first.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add task completion status and method to change status
commitResults.messageBody:
The two new methods are able to change the status of the tasks if
needed.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add 3 new classes which are inherited from the main task class
commitResults.messageBody:
The new classes allow the chatbot to create todo, deadlines and events
while being able to use the methods of the main task class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code by extraction and make code more readable
commitResults.messageBody:
Extracted code to handle printLine(), todo, event, deadline
for better readability.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add automated text UI testing
commitResults.messageBody: Allows us to check for any difference in expected and output

commitResults.messageTitle: Add exceptions to handle exceptional cases for commands entered by user
commitResults.messageBody:
Users can now see relevant help messages whenever they enter wrong
commands

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-5'
Divide classes into packages
Add delete function
commitResults.messageBody:
Delete function allows us to remove tasks from the list. There are
proper exceptions thrown when the index entered by user is out of
bounds.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add file storage for tasks with OS-independent paths
commitResults.messageBody:
Implemented file storage functionality to save tasks automatically
whenever the task list changes. Added support for loading tasks from a
file when the chatbot starts up. Used `java.nio.file.Paths` and
`System.getProperty("user.home")` to ensure OS-independent file paths.
Handled cases where the data file or directory does not exist at
startup. Integrated polymorphism to support saving and loading of
`Todo`, `Deadline`, and `Event` tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-7'
Add saving of files when tasks are removed
Refactor the code to make it more OOP
commitResults.messageBody:
Added classes for commands, ui, parser and storage to refactor code,
for enhanced readability. Fixed some bugs that was causing the code
to be unable to read the status of todo tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Taught chatbot how to understand date and times
commitResults.messageBody:
Chatbot can read dates for deadlines and events in a specific format. If
it does not understand, the chatbot will print the original input.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add a search functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
Chatbot will be able to search tasks associated with the provided
keyword and print out those list of tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Javadoc header comments to public classes/methods
